name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is a unique robotic oscilloscope with a nostalgic twist. Its retro console design, complete with a cat-shaped button, evokes memories of classic gaming. Equipped with soldier-like arms and legs, RetroCat is built for action and adventure. Its laser screen enhances its capabilities, allowing it to visualize and analyze complex waveforms with precision. RetroCat is a proud member of the WebtrES club, a community of cutting-edge robots dedicated to exploring the vast possibilities of the digital world.
